title: Chilled tomato and avocado soup
ingredients: ['1 ripe tomato, peeled and quartered', '2 large avocados - peeled, stone removed and sliced', '1 small onion, quartered', '1 green pepper, chopped', '4 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1L (1 3/4 pints) tomato juice', '275g (10 oz) low fat natural yoghurt', 'salt to taste', 'small handful chopped fresh chives', 'cayenne pepper to taste']
